byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and NICHOLAS KULISH
byline.contributor: Stephen Castle reported from Brussels, and Nicholas Kulish from Berlin.

snippet: Politicians in Slovakia struck a deal that should permit the expansion of a rescue fund for the euro a day after the governing coalition fell in a no vote on the rescue fund.
lead_paragraph: Politicians in Slovakia struck a deal that should permit the expansion of a rescue fund for the euro a day after the governing coalition fell in a no vote on the rescue fund.

headline.main: Slovakia Deal Revives Hope on Fund to Save Euro
headline.print_headline: Slovakia Deal Revives Hope On Fund To Save Euro
headline.seo: Slovakia Deal Revives Euro Rescue Fund Hopes
